keywhiz.service.daos

Class SecretDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • keywhiz.service.daos.SecretDAO

  • public class SecretDAO
extends Object
    Primary class to interact with Secrets. Does not map to a table itself, but utilizes both SecretSeriesDAO and SecretContentDAO to provide a more usable API.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • getSecretsBatched

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<SecretSeriesAndContent> getSecretsBatched(int idx,
                                                                                         int num,
                                                                                         boolean newestFirst)
        Parameters:
        idx - the first index to select in a list of secrets sorted by creation time
        num - the number of secrets after idx to select in the list of secrets
        newestFirst - if true, order the secrets from newest creation time to oldest
        Returns:
        A list of secrets

      • getSecretVersionsByName

        public Optional<com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<SanitizedSecret>> getSecretVersionsByName(String name,
                                                                                                  int versionIdx,
                                                                                                  int numVersions)
        Parameters:
        name - of secret series to look up secrets by.
        versionIdx - the first index to select in a list of versions sorted by creation time
        numVersions - the number of versions after versionIdx to select in the list of versions
        Returns:
        Versions of a secret matching input parameters or Optional.absent().

      • setCurrentSecretVersionByName

        public void setCurrentSecretVersionByName(String name,
                                          long versionId)
        Parameters:
        name - of secret series for which to reset secret version
        versionId - The identifier for the desired current version
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.NotFoundException - if secret not found

      • deleteSecretsByName

        public void deleteSecretsByName(String name)

        Parameters:
